<a id="KinematicCollision2D"></a>

# KinematicCollision2D

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Holds collision data from the movement of a [PhysicsBody2D](PhysicsBody2D.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Holds collision data from the movement of a [PhysicsBody2D](PhysicsBody2D.md), usually from [PhysicsBody2D.move_and_collide()](PhysicsBody2D.md#PhysicsBody2D_method_move_and_collide). When a [PhysicsBody2D](PhysicsBody2D.md) is moved, it stops if it detects a collision with another body. If a collision is detected, a **KinematicCollision2D** object is returned.

The collision data includes the colliding object, the remaining motion, and the collision position. This data can be used to determine a custom response to the collision.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="KinematicCollision2D_method_get_angle"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_angle**\ (\ up_direction\: [Vector2](Vector2.md) = Vector2(0, -1)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#KinematicCollision2D_method_get_angle)

Returns the collision angle according to `up_direction`, which is [Vector2.UP](Vector2.md#Vector2_constant_UP) by default. This value is always positive.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="KinematicCollision2D_method_get_collider"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Object](Object.md) **get_collider**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#KinematicCollision2D_method_get_collider)

Returns the colliding body's attached [Object](Object.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="KinematicCollision2D_method_get_collider_id"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[int](int.md) **get_collider_id**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#KinematicCollision2D_method_get_collider_id)

Returns the unique instance ID of the colliding body's attached [Object](Object.md). See [Object.get_instance_id()](Object.md#Object_method_get_instance_id).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="KinematicCollision2D_method_get_collider_rid"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **get_collider_rid**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#KinematicCollision2D_method_get_collider_rid)

Returns the colliding body's [RID](RID.md) used by the [PhysicsServer2D](PhysicsServer2D.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-method -->

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](float.md) **get_depth**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#KinematicCollision2D_method_get_depth)

Returns the colliding body's length of overlap along the collision normal.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="KinematicCollision2D_method_get_local_shape"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Object](Object.md) **get_local_shape**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#KinematicCollision2D_method_get_local_shape)

Returns the moving object's colliding shape.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="KinematicCollision2D_method_get_normal"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_normal**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#KinematicCollision2D_method_get_normal)

Returns the colliding body's shape's normal at the point of collision.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_position**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#KinematicCollision2D_method_get_position)
